data.source: Creates a drop down menu ---- !!Parameters ---- !!See Also: [EndMenu|/OpenForum/Extensions/EndMenu],[MenuItem|/OpenForum/Extensions/MenuItem],[StartMenuDropDown|/OpenForum/Extensions/StartMenuDropDown] !!Usage: {{{ [{StartMenu}] [{MenuItem title="Menu Item Example" options="Documentation|http://open-forum.onestonesoup.org/OpenForum/Documentation"}] [{StartMenuDropDown title="Menu Drop Down Example"}] The BBC Google [{EndMenuDropDown}] [{EndMenu}] }}} [{StartMenu}] [{MenuItem title="Menu Item Example" options="Documentation|http://open-forum.onestonesoup.org/OpenForum/Documentation"}] [{StartMenuDropDown title="Menu Drop Down Example"}] The BBC Google [{EndMenuDropDown}] [{EndMenu}]
